channel.title: Pages on Salah Rihane
channel.description: Recent content in Pages on Salah Rihane

item.title: Algebra 1
item.description:
Algebra 1 - Course Lectures

Welcome to the Algebra 1 course. Below, you can find the lectures organized by chapter. Click on the download button to get the PDF for each chapter.

Chapters Overview

Chapter 1: Basic Algebraic Concepts

This chapter introduces the fundamental concepts of algebra including variables, constants, expressions, and equations.

Download PDF

Chapter 2: Linear Equations and Inequalities

Learn how to solve and graph linear equations and inequalities, an essential part of algebra.

Publications of Salah Eddine Rihane

Articles

2024

  • Ad{'e}dji, Kou{`e}ssi Norbert and Dossou-yovo, Virgile and Rihane, Salah Eddine and Togb{'e}, Alain
    On {{(b)}}-repdigits as product of consecutive of {Lucas} members
    Published in Quaest. Math..
    Volume 47, Number 1, Pages 201–217.
    DOI: 10.2989/16073606.2023.2206052.

    Keywords: 11B39,11J86.

  • G{'o}mez, Carlos A. and Rihane, Salah Eddine and Togb{'e}, Alain
    On the {{(X)}}-coordinates of Pell equations {{(X^2 - dY^2 = \pm 1)}} as difference of two {Fibonacci} numbers
    Published in Int. J. Number Theory.
    Volume 20, Number 2, Pages 487–506.
    DOI: 10.1142/S1793042124500258.

item.title: Contact
item.description:
Contact Information

If you have any questions or would like to get in touch with me, please feel free to reach out through any of the following contact methods:

Email Addresses:

  • Personal Email: salahrihane@hotmail.fr
  • Institutional Email: salaheddine.rihane@nhsm.edu.dz

Office Location:

National Higher School of Mathematics (ENSM)
P.O. Box 75, Mahelma
16093 Sidi Abdellah, Algiers
ALGERIA

Contact Form:

Feel free to use the contact form below to send me a message. I will respond as soon as possible.
